name: perl6-all
comments: See http://dev.perl.org/lists for more Perl6 mailing lists on a wide variety of topics
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl6-all-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: A read-only full feed of all Perl6 mailing lists. Procmail, patience and the digest are highly recommended.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl6-all-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: perl6-all-help@perl.org
